author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Implement an N-dimensional vector add test with alpaka and `cms::alpakatools` utilities.
Refactor the checks for accelerators that support multiple threads per block (_e.g._ GPUs) or a single thread with multiple elements (_e.g._ serial CPUs), and use the new constant to simplify the workdiv generation and the strided loops.

#### PR validation:

The new unit tests pass.
title: Fix N-dimensional strided loops and extend the alpaka tests
